  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202690</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Literature Lamps: The Weirdo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur-Lampen: Der Weirdo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lampes de Littérature : Le Weirdo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lâmpadas Da Literatura: O Weirdo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lampade Della Letteratura: Il Weirdo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λαμπτήρες λογοτεχνίας: Το Weirdo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lámparas De la Literatura: El Weirdo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Literature is tied to an integrated curriculum for student success. Emphasis is on reading and communication.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur wird an einen integrierten Lehrplan für
Kursteilnehmererfolg gebunden. Hauptgewicht ist auf Messwert und
Kommunikation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La littérature est attachée à un programme 
d'études intégré pour le succès d'étudiant. L'emphase est 
sur la lecture et la transmission.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A literatura é amarrada a um curriculum integrado
para o sucesso do estudante. A ênfase está na leitura e na 
comunicação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La letteratura è legata ad un programma di studi 
integrato per successo dell'allievo. L'enfasi è su lettura e 
sulla comunicazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λογοτεχνία είναι δεμένη σε ένα ενσωματωμένο 
πρόγραμμα σπουδών για την επιτυχία σπουδαστών. Η έμφαση 
είναι στην ανάγνωση και την επικοινωνία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La literatura se ata a un plan de estudios 
integrado para el éxito del estudiante. El énfasis está en la
lectura y la comunicación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

    </metadata>
  </description>
